Earthdragon Watcher Gilmore: The core of the magic force field is a gateway that was created by those who locked away Antharas. A portal stone acts as a key to enter it. Another earthdragon watcher, Theodric is in charge of the portal stone and gives it only to authorized seal watchers.
If you would like to get a hold of a portal stone, first go see seal watcher Gabrielle. After you have been approved by her, come back and see me.
